column2: "Oh, hello, comrade. There have been a lot more ARKS coming to Naberius lately."
"Up until that incident with Darkers here, it was a rare chance to run into anyone here."
"But the fact that there are a lot of ARKS here, means that it's very dangerous. Really, not needing anyone here is best."
"If that happens then we'd be out of a job, but peace is best."
"Hm? There was someone saying the same thing as me?"
